name: wgl-toolchain
description: WGLScript formatter, linter, intellisense for VS Code
author: Maxim Gutsan

wglscript.intellisense.workspaceFeatures.markdownDescription: Find all references of Symbol in Project instead refs in local script module context (build from active TextDocument on each language feature request)
Rename all references of Symbol in Project instead refs in local script module context (build from active TextDocument on each language feature request)

Cut the list of modules to a specified **length** where the Symbol is mentioned for [find all References in Project](#wglscript.intellisense.workspaceFeatures.findAllReferencesInProject) or [rename all References in Project](#wglscript.intellisense.workspaceFeatures.renameAllReferencesInProject). If both workspace features are disabled this option has no effect. Reduce for _speed up_ processing **find all references, rename info**. **Warning** This option purposely cuts potentially useful links.

wglscript.intellisense.buildThreads.markdownDescription: Maximum build threads count on _initialize toolchain_

wglscript.intellisense.tsvfsThreads.markdownDescription: Maximum TypeScript Virtual File System threads for workspace features ([find refs](#wglscript.intellisense.workspaceFeatures.findAllReferencesInProject), [rename Symbol](#wglscript.intellisense.workspaceFeatures.renameAllReferencesInProject)). Too large a setting can lead to memory failure and service failure

wglscript.globalScript.path.markdownDescription: Global script module absolute path of wglscript project e.g. `Lib/AppGlobalScript.js`
